nodes.title: Each time you get a tissue graft, one of the four groups of Lamia will appear
nodes.description: Each time you get a tissue graft, one of the four groups of Lamia will appear. These include the following groups:.

nodes.title: The Lamia have high evasion.
nodes.description: The Lamia have high evasion..

nodes.title: The Lamia Prosector (BLM) will have buffed itself with Ice Spikes
nodes.description: The Lamia Prosector (BLM) will have buffed itself with Ice Spikes. It cannot be slept or silenced.

nodes.title: The other Lamiae can be slept, but have high resist rates.
nodes.description: The other Lamiae can be slept, but have high resist rates..

nodes.title: They have a very large visual aggro/link range but it is possible to pull them individually if your puller is good.

nodes.title: They do not hit very hard (which is good since you may have 50% HP cap from raptor tissue), but the -aga 3's from the BLM's will still hit for full...
nodes.description: They do not hit very hard (which is good since you may have 50% HP cap from raptor tissue), but the -aga 3's from the BLM's will still hit for full damage..

nodes.title: Once the group of Lamia is dead, talk to the NPC again
nodes.description: Once the group of Lamia is dead, talk to the NPC again. Another random tissue will be grafted to your body and one of the other Lamia groups will appear.

nodes.title: Go through 4 sets of tissue grafts/mobs to unlock the Rune of Release at the start point.

nodes.title: Each mob is a tarutaru of a specific element
nodes.description: Each mob is a tarutaru of a specific element. They cast T3, T4, Ga2, AM, AM2, and their elemental debuffs, including Paralyze II (Glaciers) and Slow II (Boulders).

nodes.title: Each Clone will summon their respective Avatar and use Astral Flow around 50% HP
nodes.description: Each Clone will summon their respective Avatar and use Astral Flow around 50% HP. The avatar will vanish instantly after unleashing the blood pact.

nodes.title: Clone of Shadows will use Curse which is very bad for Kite method so pulling him first is ideal.
nodes.description: Clone of Shadows will use Curse which is very bad for Kite method so pulling him first is ideal..

nodes.title: All Clones have Party aggro
nodes.description: All Clones have Party aggro. That is, even if everyone moves to the BC entrance and someone runs or raises close to the Clones, they will immediately run and aggro everyone even if previous party members have done nothing for threat.

location.zone: the BC entrance and someone runs or raises close to the Clones

nodes.description: Shortly thereafter you will get a message "A Qiqirn mine's time-based fuse seems to have been activated somewhere...". You then have approximately 30 seconds after this "activation" before the bomb explodes.

nodes.description: When you are in the right position, the bomb will appear..
